info.task: open collapsed select-only combobox to last option
info.title: Open a collapsed select-only combobox to the last option

user: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox and set focus on the last option.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox and set focus on the last option.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('Favorite Fruit') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Huckleberry') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (13) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
